Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: A genetic disorder characterized by excretion of large amounts of OXALATES in urine; NEPHROLITHIASIS; NEPHROCALCINOSIS; early onset of RENAL FAILURE; and often a generalized deposit of CALCIUM OXALATE. There are subtypes classified by the enzyme defects in glyoxylate metabolism.
